job.title: Data Scientist (junior)
job.description: At PMX, the Decisioning team is looking for a talented junior Data Scientist for an exciting opportunity to be involved with building out a predictive analytics framework. Candidates considered based on their ability to prototype highly parallelized scripts related to solutions anticipating behavior and deriving insights from big data. As well as their ability to manage research projects resulting in real world project and data pipelines that support data products. ResponsibilitiesPrototype, design and implement machine learning, natural language processing and predictive analytics scripts in pythonDesign APIs that will enable streamlined operation of end-to-end frameworksData wrangle large datasets for purposes of universal schema and feature engineeringWork with client teams on discovery work to identify inefficient process(es) that can be automatedWork with data engineers to optimize code base for parallel architecture Work with data engineers on bug fixes, client enhancement requests and code optimization Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis To enjoy being challenged and solve complex problems on a daily basis Excellent oral and written communication skills Ability to work in teams and collaborate across multiple teams Communicate concisely and persuasively with engineers and product managers QualificationsBachelor’s Degree in Computer Science/Engineering/Data ScienceExperience with Python, data pre-processing, machine learning APIs () and NLP APIs (nltk, genism, spaCy)Knowledge of statistics and probability theoryAdditional InformationAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
